property: The client which initiated the instance.
If type is integer or float, this is the maximum value of the number. If type is string, this is the maximum length of the string.
If type is integer or float, this is the minimum value of the number. If type is string, this is the minimum length of the string.
The default value for the argument.
Whether the argument accepts an infinite number of values.
Validator function for validating a value for the argument. ({@see \CharlotteDunois\Livia\Types\ArgumentType::validate})
Parser function to parse a value for the argument. ({@see \CharlotteDunois\Livia\Types\ArgumentType::parse})
Empty checker function for the argument. ({@see \CharlotteDunois\Livia\Types\ArgumentType::isEmpty})
How long to wait for input (in seconds).

client.name: client
client.short_desc: The client which initiated the instance.

default.name: default
default.short_desc: The default value for the argument.

emptyChecker.name: emptyChecker
emptyChecker.short_desc: Empty checker function for the argument. ({@see \CharlotteDunois\Livia\Types\ArgumentType::isEmpty})

infinite.name: infinite
infinite.short_desc: Whether the argument accepts an infinite number of values.

max.name: max
max.short_desc: If type is integer or float, this is the maximum value of the number. If type is string, this is the maximum length of the string.

min.name: min
min.short_desc: If type is integer or float, this is the minimum value of the number. If type is string, this is the minimum length of the string.

parse.name: parse
parse.short_desc: Parser function to parse a value for the argument. ({@see \CharlotteDunois\Livia\Types\ArgumentType::parse})

validate.name: validate
validate.short_desc: Validator function for validating a value for the argument. ({@see \CharlotteDunois\Livia\Types\ArgumentType::validate})

wait.name: wait
wait.short_desc: How long to wait for input (in seconds).

__construct.name: __construct
__construct.short_desc: Constructs a new Argument. Info is an array as following:
__construct.long_desc:
array(
  'key' => string, (Key for the argument)
  'label' => string, (Label for the argument, defaults to key)
  'prompt' => string, (First prompt for the argument when it wasn't specified)
  'type' => string, (Type of the argument, must be the ID of one of the registered argument types)
  'max' => int|float, (If type is integer or float this is the maximum value, if type is string this is the maximum length, optional)
  'min' => int|float, (If type is integer or float this is the minimum value, if type is string this is the minimum length, optional)
  'default' => mixed, (Default value for the argumen, must not be null, optional)
  'infinite' => bool, (Infinite argument collecting, defaults to false)
  'validate' => callable, (Validator function for the argument, optional)
  'parse' => callable, (Parser function for the argument, optional)
  'emptyChecker' => callable, (Empty checker function for the argument, optional)
  'wait' => int (How long to wait for input (in seconds)
)

obtain.name: obtain
obtain.short_desc: Prompts the user and obtains the value for the argument. Resolves with an array of ('value' => mixed, 'cancelled' => string|null, 'prompts' => Message[], 'answers' => Message[]). Cancelled can be one of user, time and promptLimit.
errors: "6" @param tags are expected but only "4" found

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Arguments\\Argum.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\Arguments\ArgumentCollector
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Arguments\\Argum.short_desc: Obtains, validates, and prompts for argument values.

property: The client which initiated the instance.
Maximum number of times to prompt for a single argument.

client.name: client
client.short_desc: The client which initiated the instance.

promptLimit.name: promptLimit
promptLimit.short_desc: Maximum number of times to prompt for a single argument.

obtain.name: obtain
obtain.short_desc: Obtains values for the arguments, prompting if necessary.

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\CommandDispatche.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\CommandDispatcher
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\CommandDispatche.short_desc: Handles parsing messages and running commands from them.

property: The client which initiated the instance.
Functions that can block commands from running.

client.name: client
client.short_desc: The client which initiated the instance.

inhibitors.name: inhibitors
inhibitors.short_desc: Functions that can block commands from running.

addInhibitor.name: addInhibitor
addInhibitor.short_desc: Adds an inhibitor. The inhibitor is supposed to return false, if the command should not be blocked. Otherwise it should return a string (as reason) or an array, containing as first element the reason and as second element a Promise (which resolves to a Message), a Message instance or null. The inhibitor can return a Promise (for async computation).

property: The client which initiated the instance.
The message that triggers the command.
The command that got triggered, if any.
Pattern matches (if from a pattern trigger).

client.name: client
client.short_desc: The client which initiated the instance.

command.name: command
command.short_desc: The command that got triggered, if any.

message.name: message
message.short_desc: The message that triggers the command.

patternMatches.name: patternMatches
patternMatches.short_desc: Pattern matches (if from a pattern trigger).

direct.name: direct
direct.short_desc: Responds with a direct message. Resolves with an instance of Message or an array of Message instances.

parseArgs.name: parseArgs
parseArgs.short_desc: Parses an argument string into an array of arguments.

parseCommandArgs.name: parseCommandArgs
parseCommandArgs.short_desc: Parses the argString into usable arguments, based on the argsType and argsCount of the command.

reply.name: reply
reply.short_desc: Responds with a reply message. Resolves with an instance of Message or an array of Message instances.

run.name: run
run.short_desc: Runs the command. Resolves with an instance of Message or an array of Message instances.

say.name: say
say.short_desc: Responds with a plain message. Resolves with an instance of Message or an array of Message instances.

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\CommandRegistry.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\CommandRegistry
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\CommandRegistry.short_desc: Handles registration and searching of commands and groups.

property: The client which initiated the instance.
Registered commands, mapped by their name.
Fully resolved path to the bot's commands directory.
Registered command groups, mapped by their name.
Registered argument types, mapped by their name.

client.name: client
client.short_desc: The client which initiated the instance.

commands.name: commands
commands.short_desc: Registered commands, mapped by their name.

commandsPath.name: commandsPath
commandsPath.short_desc: Fully resolved path to the bot's commands directory.

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: Registered command groups, mapped by their name.

types.name: types
types.short_desc: Registered argument types, mapped by their name.

findCommands.name: findCommands
findCommands.short_desc: Finds all commands that match the search string.

exact.name: exact
exact.short_desc: Whether the search should be exact.

message.name: message
message.short_desc: The message to check usability against.

findGroups.name: findGroups
findGroups.short_desc: Finds all commands that match the search string.

exact.name: exact
exact.short_desc: Whether the search should be exact.

registerCommand.name: registerCommand
registerCommand.short_desc: Registers a command. Emits a commandRegister event for each command.

command.name: command
command.short_desc: The full qualified command name (groupID:name) or an initiated instance of it.

registerCommandsIn.name: registerCommandsIn
registerCommandsIn.short_desc: Registers all commands in a directory. The path gets saved as commands path. Emits a commandRegister event for each command.

ignoreSameLevelFiles.name: ignoreSameLevelFiles
ignoreSameLevelFiles.short_desc: Ignores files in the specified directory and only includes files in sub directories. As string it will ignore the file if the filename matches with the string.

registerDefaults.name: registerDefaults
registerDefaults.short_desc: Registers the default argument types, groups, and commands.

registerGroup.name: registerGroup
registerGroup.short_desc: Registers a group. Emits a groupRegister event for each group.

group.name: group
group.short_desc: An instance of CommandGroup or an associative array ('id' => string, 'name' => string).

registerType.name: registerType
registerType.short_desc: Registers a type. Emits a typeRegister event for each type.

type.name: type
type.short_desc: The full qualified class name or an initiated instance of it.

registerTypesIn.name: registerTypesIn
registerTypesIn.short_desc: Registers all types in a directory. Emits a typeRegister event for each type.

ignoreSameLevelFiles.name: ignoreSameLevelFiles
ignoreSameLevelFiles.short_desc: Ignores files in the specified directory and only includes files in sub directories. As string it will ignore the file if the filename matches with the string.

reregisterCommand.name: reregisterCommand
reregisterCommand.short_desc: Reregisters a command. Emits a commandReregister event.

command.name: command
command.short_desc: The full qualified command name (groupID:name) or an initiated instance of it.

resolveCommand.name: resolveCommand
resolveCommand.short_desc: Resolves a given command, command name or command message to the command.

resolveCommandPath.name: resolveCommandPath
resolveCommandPath.short_desc: Resolves a given group ID and command name to the path.

resolveGroup.name: resolveGroup
resolveGroup.short_desc: Resolves a given commandgroup, command group name or command message to the command group.

unregisterCommand.name: unregisterCommand
unregisterCommand.short_desc: Unregisters a command. Emits a commandUnregister event.

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Commands\\Comman.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\Commands\Command
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Commands\\Comman.short_desc: A command that can be run in a client.

property: The client which initiated the instance.
The group the command belongs to, assigned upon registration.
ID of the command group the command is part of.
A short description of the command.
A longer description of the command.
Usage format string of the command.
Examples of and for the command.
Whether the command can only be triggered in a guild channel.
Whether the command can only be triggered by the bot owner (requires default hasPermission method).
The required permissions for the client user to make the command work.
The required permissions for the user to use the command.
Whether the command can only be run in NSFW channels.
Whether the command gets handled normally.
An array containing the command arguments.
How many times the user gets prompted for an argument.
Whether single quotes are allowed to encapsulate an argument.
How the arguments are split when passed to the command's run method.
Maximum number of arguments that will be split.
Whether the command is protected from being disabled.

args.name: args
args.short_desc: An array containing the command arguments.

argsCount.name: argsCount
argsCount.short_desc: Maximum number of arguments that will be split.

argsPromptLimit.name: argsPromptLimit
argsPromptLimit.short_desc: How many times the user gets prompted for an argument.

argsSingleQuotes.name: argsSingleQuotes
argsSingleQuotes.short_desc: Whether single quotes are allowed to encapsulate an argument.

argsType.name: argsType
argsType.short_desc: How the arguments are split when passed to the command's run method.

client.name: client
client.short_desc: The client which initiated the instance.

clientPermissions.name: clientPermissions
clientPermissions.short_desc: The required permissions for the client user to make the command work.

defaultHandling.name: defaultHandling
defaultHandling.short_desc: Whether the command gets handled normally.

description.name: description
description.short_desc: A short description of the command.

details.name: details
details.short_desc: A longer description of the command.

examples.name: examples
examples.short_desc: Examples of and for the command.

format.name: format
format.short_desc: Usage format string of the command.

group.name: group
group.short_desc: The group the command belongs to, assigned upon registration.

groupID.name: groupID
groupID.short_desc: ID of the command group the command is part of.

guarded.name: guarded
guarded.short_desc: Whether the command is protected from being disabled.

guildOnly.name: guildOnly
guildOnly.short_desc: Whether the command can only be triggered in a guild channel.

nsfw.name: nsfw
nsfw.short_desc: Whether the command can only be run in NSFW channels.

ownerOnly.name: ownerOnly
ownerOnly.short_desc: Whether the command can only be triggered by the bot owner (requires default hasPermission method).

userPermissions.name: userPermissions
userPermissions.short_desc: The required permissions for the user to use the command.

__construct.name: __construct
__construct.short_desc: Constructs a new Command. Info is an array as following:
__construct.long_desc:
array(
  'name' => string,
  'aliases' => string[], (optional)
  'group' => string, (the ID of the command group)
  'description => string,
  'details' => string, (optional)
  'format' => string, (optional)
  'examples' => string[], (optional)
  'guildOnly' => bool, (defaults to false)
  'ownerOnly' => bool, (defaults to false)
  'clientPermissions' => string[], (optional)
  'userPermissions' => string[], (optional)
  'nsfw' => bool, (defaults to false)
  'throttling' => array, (associative array of array('usages' => int, 'duration' => int) - duration in seconds, optional)
  'defaultHandling' => bool, (defaults to true)
  'args' => array, ({@see \CharlotteDunois\Livia\Arguments\Argument} - key can be the index instead, optional)
  'argsPromptLimit' => int|\INF, (optional)
  'argsType' => string, (one of 'single' or 'multiple', defaults to 'single')
  'argsCount' => int, (optional)
  'argsSingleQuotes' => bool, (optional)
  'patterns' => string[], (Regular Expression strings, pattern matches don't get parsed for arguments, optional)
  'guarded' => bool, (defaults to false)
)

anyUsage.name: anyUsage
anyUsage.short_desc: Creates a usage string for any command.

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.short_desc: Prefix to use for the prefixed command format.

user.name: user
user.short_desc: User to use for the mention command format.

hasPermission.name: hasPermission
hasPermission.short_desc: Checks if the user has permission to use the command.
hasPermission.hint_desc: Whether the user has permission, or an error message to respond with if they don't.

ownerOverride.name: ownerOverride
ownerOverride.short_desc: Whether the bot owner(s) will always have permission.

isEnabledIn.name: isEnabledIn
isEnabledIn.short_desc: Checks if the command is enabled in a guild (or globally).

guild.name: guild
guild.short_desc: The guild instance or the guild ID.

isUsable.name: isUsable
isUsable.short_desc: Checks if the command is usable for a message.

run.name: run
run.short_desc: Runs the command. The method must return null, an array of Message instances or an instance of Message, a Promise that resolves to an instance of Message, or an array of Message instances. The array can contain Promises which each resolves to an instance of Message.

message.name: message
message.short_desc: The message the command is being run for

args.name: args
args.short_desc: The arguments for the command, or the matches from a pattern. If args is specified on the command, thise will be the argument values object. If argsType is single, then only one string will be passed. If multiple, an array of strings will be passed. When fromPattern is true, this is the matches array from the pattern match.

fromPattern.name: fromPattern
fromPattern.short_desc: Whether or not the command is being run from a pattern match

setEnabledIn.name: setEnabledIn
setEnabledIn.short_desc: Enables or disables the command in a guild (or globally).

guild.name: guild
guild.short_desc: The guild instance or the guild ID.

usage.name: usage
usage.short_desc: Creates a usage string for the command.

argString.name: argString
argString.short_desc: A string of arguments for the command.

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.short_desc: Prefix to use for the prefixed command format.

user.name: user
user.short_desc: User to use for the mention command format. Defaults to client user.

property: The client which initiated the instance.
Whether this group is guarded against disabling.
The commands that the group contains.

client.name: client
client.short_desc: The client which initiated the instance.

commands.name: commands
commands.short_desc: The commands that the group contains.

guarded.name: guarded
guarded.short_desc: Whether this group is guarded against disabling.

isEnabledIn.name: isEnabledIn
isEnabledIn.short_desc: Checks if the group is enabled in a guild.

guild.name: guild
guild.short_desc: The guild instance or the guild ID.

reload.name: reload
reload.short_desc: Reloads all of the group's commands.

setEnabledIn.name: setEnabledIn
setEnabledIn.short_desc: Enables or disables the group in a guild.

guild.name: guild
guild.short_desc: The guild instance or the guild ID.

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Exceptions\\Comm.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\Exceptions\CommandFormatException
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Exceptions\\Comm.short_desc: Has a descriptive message for a command not having proper format.

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Exceptions\\Frie.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\Exceptions\FriendlyException
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Exceptions\\Frie.short_desc: Has a message that can be considered user-friendly.

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\LiviaClient.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\LiviaClient
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\LiviaClient.short_desc: The Command Client, the heart of the framework.

property: Owners of the bot, set by the client option owners. If you simply need to check if a user is an owner of the bot, please use LiviaClient::isOwner instead. ({@see \CharlotteDunois\Livia\LiviaClient:isOwner})

owners.name: owners
owners.short_desc: Owners of the bot, set by the client option owners. If you simply need to check if a user is an owner of the bot, please use LiviaClient::isOwner instead. ({@see \CharlotteDunois\Livia\LiviaClient:isOwner})

__construct.name: __construct
__construct.short_desc: Constructs a new Command Client. Additional available Client Options are as following:
__construct.long_desc:
array(
  'commandPrefix' => string|null, (Default command prefix, null means only mentions will trigger the handling, defaults to l$)
  'commandEditableDuration' => int, (Time in seconds that command messages should be editable, defaults to 30)
  'nonCommandEditable' => bool, (Whether messages without commands can be edited to a command, defaults to true)
  'unknownCommandResponse' => bool, (Whether the bot should respond to an unknown command, defaults to true)
  'owners' => string[], (array of user IDs)
  'invite' => string, (Invite URL to the bot's support server)
)

getGuildPrefix.name: getGuildPrefix
getGuildPrefix.short_desc: Get the guild's prefix - or the default prefix. Null means only mentions.

isOwner.name: isOwner
isOwner.short_desc: Checks whether an user is an owner of the bot.

setCommandPrefix.name: setCommandPrefix
setCommandPrefix.short_desc: Sets the global command prefix. Null indicates that there is no default prefix, and only mentions will be used. Emits a commandPrefixChange event.

setGuildPrefix.name: setGuildPrefix
setGuildPrefix.short_desc: Set the guild's prefix. An empty string means the command prefix will be used. Null means only mentions.

setProvider.name: setProvider
setProvider.short_desc: Sets the setting provider to use, and initializes it once the client is ready

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\LiviaClientEvent.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\LiviaClientEvents
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\LiviaClientEvent.short_desc: Documents all LiviaClient events (exlucing events from Yasmin).

commandBlocked.name: commandBlocked
commandBlocked.short_desc: Emitted when a command is prevented from running.

commandError.name: commandError
commandError.short_desc: Emitted when a command produces an error while running.

commandPrefixChange.name: commandPrefixChange
commandPrefixChange.short_desc: Emitted whenever a guild's command prefix is changed. Guild will be null if the prefix is global. Prefix will be null if it is changed to default.

commandRegister.name: commandRegister
commandRegister.short_desc: Emitted when a command is registered.

commandReregister.name: commandReregister
commandReregister.short_desc: Emitted when a command is re-registered.

commandStatusChange.name: commandStatusChange
commandStatusChange.short_desc: Emitted whenever a command is enabled/disabled in a guild. Guild will be null if status is global.

commandUnregister.name: commandUnregister
commandUnregister.short_desc: Emitted when a command is unregistered.

groupRegister.name: groupRegister
groupRegister.short_desc: Emitted when a group is registered.

groupStatusChange.name: groupStatusChange
groupStatusChange.short_desc: Emitted whenever a group is enabled/disabled in a guild. Guild will be null if status is global.

typeRegister.name: typeRegister
typeRegister.short_desc: Emitted when an argument type is registered.

unknownCommand.name: unknownCommand
unknownCommand.short_desc: Emitted when an user tries to use an unknown command.

warn.name: warn
warn.short_desc: Emitted when something out of expectation occurres. A warning for you.

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Providers\\MySQL.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\Providers\MySQLProvider
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Providers\\MySQL.short_desc: Loads and stores settings associated with guilds in a MySQL database. Requires the composer package react/mysql.

create.name: create
create.short_desc: Creates a new table row in the db for the guild, if it doesn't exist already - otherwise loads the row.

runQuery.name: runQuery
runQuery.short_desc: Runs a SQL query. Resolves with the Command instance.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.short_desc: Parameters for the query - these get escaped

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Providers\\Setti.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\Providers\SettingProvider
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Providers\\Setti.short_desc: Loads and stores settings associated with guilds.

clear.name: clear
clear.short_desc: Removes all settings in a guild.

destroy.name: destroy
destroy.short_desc: Destroys the provider, removing any event listeners.

get.name: get
get.short_desc: Gets a setting from a guild.

getGuildID.name: getGuildID
getGuildID.short_desc: Obtains the ID of the provided guild.

init.name: init
init.short_desc: Initializes the provider by connecting to databases and/or caching all data in memory. LiviaClient::setProvider will automatically call this once the client is ready.

remove.name: remove
remove.short_desc: Removes a setting from a guild.

set.name: set
set.short_desc: Sets a setting for a guild.

CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Types\\ArgumentT.name: CharlotteDunois\Livia\Types\ArgumentType
CharlotteDunois\\Livia\\Types\\ArgumentT.short_desc: An argument type that can be used for argument collecting.

property: The client which initiated the instance.

client.name: client
client.short_desc: The client which initiated the instance.

isEmpty.name: isEmpty
isEmpty.short_desc: Checks whether a value is considered to be empty. This determines whether the default value for an argument should be used and changes the response to the user under certain circumstances.
errors: The "msg" @param tag variable name is wrong (should be "message")

parse.name: parse
parse.short_desc: Parses a value into an usable value.
errors: The "msg" @param tag variable name is wrong (should be "message")

validate.name: validate
validate.short_desc: Validates a value against the type.
errors: The "msg" @param tag variable name is wrong (should be "message")

disambiguation.name: disambiguation
disambiguation.short_desc: If a selection is ambiguous, this will make a list of selectable items.

recursiveFileSearch.name: recursiveFileSearch
recursiveFileSearch.short_desc: Performs a recursive file search in the specified path, using the specified search mask.
